Reviews.Title: Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: This is an excelent product, it gives the appereance of the real thing, the blinking red light can be seen from a long distance.

Reviews.Title: extremely poor quality
Reviews.Author: a gadfly
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of this particular item and BOTH came broken.  It was poorly constructed and in one case the front lens was broken and in the other case the brackets were broken!  IN both cameras the red LED did not go on even with new batteries.  In a world of many camera replicas and fake cameras, these were awful!

ProductInfo.Features:
Includes an LED light to mimic the appearance of a real, active security camera.
Can be used both indoors and outdoors
Camera Measures 12" x 4" x 4.5" (excluding mounting bracket)
Includes all mounting hardware. Hardware is adjustable.
Camera Operates on 2 "AA" batteries (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Outdoor Fake Security Camera w/ LED Lights
